file_content.text: Good day, my lord.
Master Jedi, we're ready.
We're ready, Commander.
Where are the others?
Theron is online from the Mestani sector. The rest are unavailable--on scouting or security detail.
The ones who aren't dead.
The ones you haven't banished.
Kaliyo was unpredictable. Discipline has to be enforced.
I liked Jorgan. But discipline has to be enforced.
I'd prefer to be patrolling myself. Can we proceed?
I have additional information regarding the GEMINI network that controls the Eternal Fleet.
The network links mechanical captains inside the fleet's ships. Their security protocols cannot be directly subverted.
Why not?
Because the GEMINI captains are based on me.
I understood your design was unique, or close to it. Now you're saying Zakuul has an army of SCORPIO models?
Explain, SCORPIO.
Imitations programmed to control the fleet. How they came to exist, I do not know, but I will not be imitated.
You said Zakuul took something from you. This is what you meant--this is what you've been looking for.
Is this why you joined us?
You've been holding back on us. You knew what GEMINI was and you lied about it.
I knew we couldn't trust you.
Yes.
My suspicions about GEMINI brought me to Zakuul. Now they are confirmed. I will not be imitated, and I will determine who is responsible.
Based on what I have decoded, the GEMINIs are produced from a mold--a template. GEMINI Prime.
Why a physical template?
My technology is not easily duplicated.
The GEMINI Prime is linked to a factory on the world of Darvannis. Retrieve the unit, and I will unlock the secrets of the network and the fleet.
We get the Eternal Fleet, and you find out who's been copying you and how. Is that the deal?
You help us, we help you?
Yes.
Then whatever other problems we may have, GEMINI Prime is our best lead. Senya, what can you tell us about the target?
Let's talk about this factory.
You've made promises about the fleet before. This is your final chance. Understood?
If you fail, you're finished.
I understand you intimately.
I know Darvannis. One of the first worlds we conquered when the war started--a staging point into the wider galaxy.
That factory builds droids, weapons, starships... it's a key resource, fortified accordingly. Fully automated defenses.
I've seen its like--tunnels running kilometers deep. Too large for a strike team.
Then we plan a full-scale assault. How close are we to assembling an army?
We don't have nearly enough people here. But Theron...
I've been securing military allies along the Rim. There's a favor I can pull in.
Rather not say more over the comm, but I can set a rendezvous with forces on Darvannis. You could take the factory and grab GEMINI.
It's been a while since I led troops into battle. But that's the burden of a Jedi in wartime.
Then it's back to war.
Been a while since I ran an op like this. Time to get back in practice.
Then it's back to war.
What are the odds your forces can handle the factory while I run cargo to some gullible Ortolans?
War is never my strong suit.
Low. Not nonexistent, but low.
I was born to command legions. Now at last we reenter the fray.
War. It's been too long.
Sheer numbers can serve where the Force and intricate plans will not. Very well; I will lead.
Crude, but it must be done.
I'm not a general, Theron. But I suppose infiltrating the droid factory is out of the question.
War is never my strong suit.
Afraid so.
Go to war to kidnap a droid. It's almost simple.
I've followed worse plans.
I'd prefer if I knew who I was fighting with. Will your forces be enough? Can we trust them?
You're sure about your allies?
They've got the skill and the firepower. As for trust... they won't stab us in the back. Just shoot us in the face.
Marvelous.
Arcann must know we're investigating GEMINI by now. If I were him, I'd expect us on Darvannis.
This could be a trap.
Maybe, but I don't think he realizes how far we've gotten.
I'll signal our allies. Any luck, they'll be on Darvannis before you.
The rest of you, get the Gravestone ready for combat. Once we have GEMINI Prime, it'll be us against the fleet. One way or another.
